body: Note: using something like govendor + vendor/ you would *only* have a single copy of "p" in use anyway, so there wouldn't be a state where *a* was using *p* @ 2.4.1 and *b* was using *p* @ 2.4.2. When you vendored them you would pick a version to record+copy or the tool would error and you would have to resolve it.
